meanings.definition: The quality or state of being daft.
meanings.sent1: Her daftnesses often made us laugh.
meanings.sent2: The daftnesses of the clown entertained the children.
meanings.sent3: His daftnesses at the party were endearing.
meanings.sent4: The daftnesses of the puppy chasing its tail were adorable.
meanings.sent5: The daftnesses of the squirrel trying to hide its acorn were amusing.

meanings.definition: Instances of foolish or silly behavior.
meanings.sent1: The daftnesses of the prank were harmless.
meanings.sent2: She regretted her daftnesses during the game.
meanings.sent3: Their daftnesses in the play made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The daftnesses of the cat playing with a toy were entertaining.
meanings.sent5: The daftnesses of the child pretending to be a superhero were adorable.
